title: vivo V23 5G (Sunshine Gold, 128 GB)  (8 GB RAM)

product_specification.In The Box: Handset, Headset, USB Cable, Charger, 3.5mm Earphone Jack Adapter, Eject Tool, Phone Case, Protective Film (Applied), Documentation
product_specification.Operating Frequency: 5G: N1/N3/N38/N40/N41/N77/N78, 4G TDD LTE: B38/B39/B40/B41, 4G FDD LTE: B1/B2/B3/B4/B5/B8/B18/B19/B26, 3G WCDMA: B1/B2/B4/B5/B8
product_specification.Primary Camera Features: Triple Camera Setup: 64 MP (f/1.89 Aperture) + 8 MP (f/2.2 Aperture) + 2 MP (f/2.4 Aperture), Camera Features: Eye Autofocus, Night, Ultra-Wide Night, Super Macro, Bokeh Portrait, Portrait Filters, Bokeh Flare Portrait, High Resolution, Live Photo, AR Stickers, Slo-Mo, Time-Lapse, Dual-View Video, Double Exposure, Documents, Pano, Pro, Ultra Stabilization
product_specification.Secondary Camera Features: Dual Camera: 50 MP (f/2.0 Aperture) + 8 MP (f/2.8 Aperture), Camera Feature: Autofocus, AI Extreme Night, Steadiface Selfie Video, Multi-Style Portrait, Double Exposure, Video Face Beauty, Dual-View Video, Slo-Mo, High Resolution, Live Photo, AR Stickers, Natural Portrait
product_specification.Sensors: Accelerometer, Ambient Light Sensor, Proximity Sensor, E-Compass, Fingerprint Sensor (In Display), Gyroscope
product_specification.Other Features: 44 W Fast Charging, Charging Time: 1% to 66% in 30 mins Flat, Widevine L1 Certificate, Material Handset: Glass, Wi-Fi Version: Support 2.4 GHz, 5 GHz
product_specification.GPS Type: GPS, BEIDOU, GLONASS, GALILEO, QZSS, NavIC
product_specification.Audio Formats: AAC, OGG, FLAC, WMA, WAV, APE, MP3, MP2, MP1, OPUS, M4A
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year for Handset and 6 Months for Accessories

product_description.Color Changing Smartphone: The Vivo V23 5G mobile phone features a color-changing glass design that interacts with sunlight and other sources of Artificial UV rays to reflect vibrant colors. Thus, offering an eye-soothing appearance to the phone.
product_description.Durable Fluorite AG Glass Design: This mobile phone comes with a Fluorite AG Glass that sparkles when it interacts with various lighting conditions. Thanks to the matte texture and diffused surface coating on its body, you can enjoy a comfortable grip and protection from fingerprints.
product_description.50 MP Eye AF Dual Selfie: This smartphone is equipped with a 50 MP front camera that helps to capture brightened photos. Also, you can click stunning selfies with rich details and vibrant colors using the Dual Selfie Camera.
product_description.Dual-tone Spotlight Mode: The dual-tone spotlight feature helps to provide a radiant look on the captured image, even under dark lighting conditions. This feature helps to adjust the brightness of the portrait, thus rendering a realistic image.
product_description.AI Extreme Night Mode: Leveraging the AI Extreme Night mode on the front camera you can merge multiple frames and AI to refine several features of your face. As a result, the selfies taken at night look bright and fresh.
product_description.Wide-angle Night Selfie: Enjoy fitting all your friends into one frame, thanks to the 105 degrees Super Wide-Angle Night Selfie. Also, you can capture clear and bright pictures using the Super Night Mode algorithm and Spotlight.
product_description.Stunning 64 MP Night Camera: This mobile phone features a 64 MP Night camera to let you capture images with clear and vivid details. It comes with 3 cameras so that you can take stunning pictures every day.
product_description.Bokeh Flare Portrait Mode: The dual camera with bokeh flare portrait allows you to enjoy a professional-level portrait photography experience by rendering a flare bokeh effect on the background. Hence, you can click creative photos at night without using professional equipment.
product_description.Powerful 44 W FlashCharge: This mobile phone comes with a large 4200 mAh battery so that you can enjoy long-lasting gameplay on this phone. And, with the 44 W FlashCharge capability in about 30 minutes flat, you don't have to worry about your battery draining out.
product_description.Stellar Performance: Powered by MediaTek Dimensity 920 processor and an advanced 6nm fabrication process, this mobile phone delivers high-end performance. Moreover, with a clock speed of 2.5 GHz, you can enjoy smooth app performance and lag-free gaming. And, thanks to the low power consumption feature, you can avail long-hours of usage.
product_description.Extended RAM 2.0: This mobile comes with an expanded RAM 2.0 that allows this phone to use idle internal memory as RAM, thus giving a RAM space. As a result, you can effortlessly switch between multiple apps rapidly and enjoy lag-free usage every day.

Vivo has made an excellent light weight and slim phone. It's feels so light in hand after upgrading with my MI 10T. Black colour looks classic because of matt & AG glass finish. Even screen size is excellent not too small & not too large. Amoled screen used is of premium quality. Both the rear & front camera gives great result. Double flash in front camera is awesome it gives unbelievable result in dark. There's some lag in ui because they have provided latest Android 12 os. I am confident that issue will be resolved in following updates. Battery life is sufficient for a day & charging is quick because of good quality flash charger. There's only one con that the phone have dimensity 920 processor...should have provided more powerful processor. Rest for sure it's a satisfactory purchase. In box they have given 44 w flash charger & good quality wired earphone.

Received the product before the promised date. Here are the reviews after couple of weeks of usage

1. Performance wise this phone is a good option. No lags are noted
2. Display is above average but not top class
3. Camera is just average. The camera angle is always wide even if the zoom is 1x mode. This create problems for clicking photos. The normal angle can only be set if the zoom is 1.5x.
4. In the night time when the flash is enabled, it is taking time to click the photos and it is a worst experience
5. Design wise it is excellent option.
6. Battery is not that great, but fast charging is good. If you are not a regular user, then you may not need a second charging for the day.

If the camera is a primary concern, then go for samsung mobiles. Overall I did not meet my expectation.

pros.16.36 cm (6.44 inch) 2400 x 1080 Pixels: The full HD+ amoled display is very crisp and sharp with 90hz refresh rate. Takes the viewing experience to another level.
pros.Camera: Both the rear and front cameras are of superior quality and captures photos in great detail. The 3 rear cameras captures stunning pictures.
pros.Build Quality: This smartphone is extremely light weight and the build is of premium quality. The phone looks stylish with its glittery backpane and the attractive color changing glass design.

cons.4200 mAh Battery: Battery backup is not upto the mark. At this price range the battery power should have been more.
cons.Performance: The MediaTek Dimensity 920 processor falls short in performance. Lagging issues are experienced at times.

summary.verdict: The Vivo V23 5G is a highly recommended buy due to its top-notch features and premium design. The camera quality of this phone makes it worth every penny.
summary.Additional Information: Metal body, Contains in screen fingerprint unlock.
